subject: Speed Skating
lead_paragraph: Havard Bokko won the 1,500-meter race and Claudia Pechstein dominated the 5,000 in Moscow to win their first speedskating World Cup races this season. Bokko finished in 1 minute 45.46 seconds. Pechstein, a four-time Olympic champion, clocked 6:49.92 for her 22nd World Cup gold. She edged the world-record holder Martina Sablikova by 7.26 seconds.
